name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Playback Speed Finish Time Estimator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly estimate YouTube video finish times at different speeds and see when it'll end in real-time. Pick the perfect speed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a feature-rich YouTube extension designed to elevate your viewing experience, helping you manage your time efficiently while offering a sleek and beautiful interface. Whether you're watching educational content, entertainment, or tutorials, this tool gives you full control over playback speed, real-time progress, and finish times, making your YouTube experience more personalized and productive.

★ Key Features:

✔ Real-Time Clock Display
 -  A live clock at the top of the YouTube page lets you track time without leaving the video, perfect for time-sensitive viewing.

✔ Video Finish Time
 -  See exactly when the video will end based on your current playback speed, helping you plan better.

✔ Remaining Time at Different Speeds
 -  View how many minutes are left at various playback speeds (1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, 1.75x, 2x), allowing you to pick the best speed for your schedule.

✔ Real-Time Progress Bar
 -  A sleek progress bar shows exactly where you are in the video, making it easier to track your progress.

✔ Custom Playback Speed Selection
 -  Easily adjust playback speed via the extension’s UI, without needing to use YouTube’s menus. Switch speeds instantly and see the updated remaining time.

✔ Supports YouTube Ambient Mode
 -  The extension integrates seamlessly with YouTube’s Ambient Mode, offering a beautiful, modern look that enhances your viewing experience.

✔ Freedom to Choose Playback Speed
 -  All the data you need—remaining time, finish time, and progress—at your fingertips, helping you choose the best speed for your needs.

★ Why This Extension?

✔ Optimize Your Time
 -  Make the most of your time with real-time data on video finish times and remaining durations at different speeds.

✔ Plan Efficiently
 -  Know exactly when a video will end, helping you fit it into your schedule.

✔ User-Friendly Interface
 -  With a simple, intuitive design and support for YouTube’s Ambient Mode, the extension feels like a natural part of YouTube, displaying all the info you need in one place.

★ Perfect For:

✔ Students
 -  Speed through lectures or study materials while knowing exactly how much time you’ll save at each playback speed.

✔ Professionals
 -  Streamline your learning from webinars, business tutorials, or educational content by adjusting the speed and tracking when it’ll finish in real-time.

✔ Content Enthusiasts
 -  If you’re a regular YouTube viewer, this extension helps you optimize your time without sacrificing the quality of your experience.

With this extension, you have everything you need to control your YouTube viewing experience—real-time progress, finish time estimates, and an elegant interface that seamlessly integrates with YouTube's aesthetic. Save time, plan ahead, and enjoy a smarter way to watch videos!
